locations.name: Athens
locations.description: The historic capital of Greece, cradle of Western civilization, featuring the Acropolis, Parthenon, and the charming Plaka district.

locations.name: Santorini
locations.description: A stunning volcanic island in the Aegean Sea, famous for its dramatic caldera views, iconic blue-domed churches in villages like Oia and Fira, and world-renowned sunsets.

locations.name: Mykonos
locations.description: A chic Cycladic island known for its vibrant energy, whitewashed Mykonos Town (Chora), picturesque Little Venice, iconic windmills, and stylish beaches.
